title: The new RPG skins say "Master every dungeon"
body: How the fuck am I going to do that WITH NO HEALER?

replies.body:
{{champion:79}} Just because he drinks most of the 'medicinal' beverages, doesn't mean Gragas Caskbreaker the _cleric_  can't cure a few of your lighter wounds!

(At least, that's the [character he rolled](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/journey-thy-golden-mustache).  Not so much in his day job.)
When Taric gets his rework can he join the rpg group I think he would make a good pick.
No, we need Bard the bard.
Nah, Bard rolled a seductive windchime. It was an interesting game, to say the least.
Alcohol heals all wounds. Nice message Rito, nice message. XD
Er, this is an appropriate time for a cigar joke, or no?

But graves can't have a cigar? {{item:3070}} {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}}

Yes. Yes i did.
Paladin Garen needs to provide his passive to the team. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
so that means we need a new {{champion:16}} ??!??!?!?!?!
They should have replaced Gragas with Taric, the Paladin.

I think the whole "next on the Rework board" thing is going to make it so he won't get any skins for a while. Afterwards though that would be a great idea, they could do the same thing they did with Ironside {{champion:54}} where they add him into the splash art afterwards.
Ooh... Unicorn Soraka?
yes-oh wait.....she already is a unicorn thing....
Celestine Soraka looks like a cleric to me.
damn it i don't like that soraka skin the hair is awful it's so awkward
Really?  I actually don't mind.  Though I guess I like the war cleric armor a lot.

i like it but the hair just gets me every time i mained soraka for a long time and even before her celestine skin came out.i used to use her Dryad skin because i have a thing for greek mythology and know what a dryad is.now i use reaper soraka cuz its awsome and the irony gets me every time! :D

Man I miss having a favorite skin when maining a champion.  I used to main {{champion:80}} and used his dragonslayer skin.  Now I main {{champion:14}} and none of his skins interest me.  Barbarian kinda does, but only for the beard and that isn't in the splash art.

i bought dragon slayer panth and it disappointed me so i just use his ~~male stripper~~ skin "ruthless" skin.i love barbarian sion because its the only fuckin skin that **doesn't** make him a damn zombie and it's the closest thing we have to pre death sion skin and i have a thing for Pre skins like pre void kass but im upset with that skin as it could be one of kass best skins but that fuckin voice filter and his newer skin.

The only reason I can't stand Barbarian Sion is the splash art.  He just looks like a moron.  Made sense with the old Sion, but the new {{champion:14}}...sigh.

I really hope we get a predeath Sion skin.  It has so much potential!
i hate how they didn't update the splash arts so that people knew what they were getting into when they update a champion.....
To be fair, no one expected splash art updates from Poppy.
i didn't expect it either but it really doesn't matter to me since i don't like any champion related to demacia. Blood for Noxus!!!!{{champion:55}}
A healer? What do you need a healer for? You got Braum, Gragas, Rize, and Varus. That is a LOT of CC. The enemy will be lucky to even hurt you.
You missed the joke :(
on the other hand he makes a great point.

> [{quoted}](name=Sammysmiles,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KfrEwabZ,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-08T10:04:47.010+0000)
>
> Though aren't Raid/Dungeon bosses resistant to CC? Meaning a healer would most certainly be needed.
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
> Always gotta have a healer in your party.

In D&D "boss" monsters aren't always immune to CC. This can lead to some interesting fights...for the players that is.
Shit, I forgot about that.

Cleric is right [here](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3192144)!

Gragas is a Battle Priest or Monk (the [other](https://youtu.be/tOUksDJCijw?t=16m15s) kind).
You know we need a Paladin {{champion:44}} skin now? :3

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KfrEwabZ,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-12-08T10:09:55.522+0000)
>
> You know we need a Paladin {{champion:44}} skin now? :3

I know it in my heart.
And please name him Taric Gemtouch xD
omg. yes.

Heart? 

Heart seeker Taric confirmed.
In my opinion, that Soraka skin looks more like a servant of the Protectorate of Menoth than a D&D-eque cleric.

> [{quoted}](name=Ayame Isaki,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KfrEwabZ,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-12-08T14:36:55.482+0000)
>
> In my opinion, that Soraka skin looks more like a servant of the Protectorate of Menoth than a D&D-eque cleric.

It's true but i don't think we would make a slightly different Cleric skin for her when this one fills the fantasy.
dem downvotes tho.
"WTF ryze, why are you on your dps account rather then the healer we made you level?"

Blacksmith {{champion:78}} sells Weapons and Armor.

And {{champion:27}} sells potions... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_FQU4KzN7A

> [{quoted}](name=Daszkal,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KfrEwabZ,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-12-08T11:56:02.179+0000)
>
> Blacksmith {{champion:78}} sells Weapons and Armor.
> 
> And {{champion:27}} sells potions... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_FQU4KzN7A

Oh man, thank you for sharing only your strongest meme.
you could just go and do it anyway them blame the healer for not being there XD
HOW ARE YOU SUPPOSED TO HAVE A HEALER, WHEN THEY CAN't LEVEL UP EFFICIENTLY BY THEM SELVES?
Dryad Soraka already exists.

{{champion:201}} =Warrior=Support/Tank
{{champion:79}} =Cleric=Jungle
{{champion:13}} =Mage=Mid? Top?
{{champion:110}} =Ranger=Marksman

They are either missing a Top Laner or a Mid Laner, They're also missing the Rogue.

Braum goes Top and {{champion:44}} Supports.

Or viceversa

Exactly!!! I was surprised to see Gragas as a part of the skin line.  I can't speak for anyone else......but most (if not all) of the RPG's I've played had a playable character with a sword.  Gragas doesn't fit my idea of the ideal team. Someone with a sword would have perfectly balanced it for me.

Mage - Ryze
Archer/ranged - Varus
Warrior - Tryn/Yasuo/Garen
Support - Braum or a healer would be nice


Missed opportunity for me  BUT Riot can make it up to me by using that fan creation of Nurse Soraka for that LoL summoner  that passed away (R.I.P).  Not sure if this is true......but I heard Jaximus was made for the same situation years ago.
It annoys me how there's only 4 of them. Why would they not have a full party!??!! WHY!!?!?!?!

I kinda include Celestine Soraka with their party seeing as she is basically a priestess/white mage.  Don't know why nobody else makes that connection.

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Soraka_3.jpg
I feel like someone should be making character sheets and posting them online.
